about.summary: Provides a general toolkit for downloading, managing, analyzing, and presenting data from the U.S. Census (<https://www.census.gov/data/developers/data-sets.html>), including SF1 (Decennial short-form), SF3 (Decennial long-form), and the American Community Survey (ACS).  Confidence intervals provided with ACS data are converted to standard errors to be bundled with estimates in complex acs objects.  Package provides new methods to conduct standard operations on acs objects and present/plot data in statistically appropriate ways.

Provides a general toolkit for downloading, managing, analyzing, and presenting data from the U.S. Census (<https://www.census.gov/data/developers/data-sets.html>), including SF1 (Decennial short-form), SF3 (Decennial long-form), and the American Community Survey (ACS).  Confidence intervals provided with ACS data are converted to standard errors to be bundled with estimates in complex acs objects.  Package provides new methods to conduct standard operations on acs objects and present/plot data in statistically appropriate ways.

name: r-acs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.1.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-acs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/acs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/acs/acs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 05aa69eaf07381253ed7ddf7200a395d72c37cdeb2af8ddf6653218a5c4e5c2a

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('acs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('acs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://dusp.mit.edu/faculty/ezra-glenn, http://eglenn.scripts.mit.edu/citystate/,
    http://mailman.mit.edu/mailman/listinfo/acs-r
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides a general toolkit for downloading, managing, analyzing, and presenting data
    from the U.S. Census (<https://www.census.gov/data/developers/data-sets.html>),
    including SF1 (Decennial short-form), SF3 (Decennial long-form), and the American
    Community Survey (ACS).  Confidence intervals provided with ACS data are converted
    to standard errors to be bundled with estimates in complex acs objects.  Package
    provides new methods to conduct standard operations on acs objects and present/plot
    data in statistically appropriate ways.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
